00037 shapeOffset::shapeOffset(){
00038         //set up menus, signals
00039         myMenu = new QMenu("Offset");
00040         theWindow->menuBar()->insertMenu(theWindow->getHelpMenu(),myMenu);
00041 
00042         offsetAction = new QAction("Face Offset", this);
00043         //offsetAction->setShortcut(QString("Ctrl+I"));
00044         offsetAction->setStatusTip("Face Offset");
00045         connect(offsetAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(offsetButton()));
00046         myMenu->addAction( offsetAction );
00047         
00048 };
00049 
00050 //this fails silently on at least one solid, an imported STEP file.  Not sure why.
00051 void shapeOffset::offsetButton(){
00052         getSelection();
00053         for (uint i=0;i < selectedShapes.size();i++) {
00054                 TopoDS_Shape S = selectedShapes[i];
00055                 switch (S.ShapeType()) {
00056                 case TopAbs_VERTEX :
00057                     //    vertexInfo(TopoDS::Vertex(S));
00058                         break;
00059                 case TopAbs_FACE :
00060                         faceOffset(TopoDS::Face(S));
00061                         break;
00062                 case TopAbs_SOLID :
00063                       //  solidInfo(TopoDS::Solid(S));
00064                         break;
00065                 case TopAbs_EDGE :
00066                      //   edgeInfo(TopoDS::Edge(S));
00067                         break;
00068                 default:
00069                         debugMsg("Warning - reached default case when testing the shape's type.",__FILE__,__LINE__);
00070                 }
00071         }
00072 }

00075 
00076 void shapeOffset::faceOffset(TopoDS_Face F) {
00077         TopoDS_Shape S = BRepOffsetAPI_MakeOffsetShape(F,5,0.0001);
00078         //offset face info
00079 
00080         slotNeutralSelection();
00081         Handle_AIS_Shape AisShape = new AIS_Shape (S);
00082         theWindow->getContext()->SetMaterial(AisShape,Graphic3d_NOM_PLASTIC);
00083         theWindow->getContext()->SetDisplayMode(AisShape,1,Standard_False);
00084         theWindow->getContext()->Display(AisShape);
00085 }
